name: Education is Easy
title: Top Male School Enrollment
description: In 2017, Malaysia achieved a perfect net intake rate of 100% for males entering grade 1, indicating a strong commitment to early education.

name: Forest Wealth
title: Significant Forest Depletion Costs
description: In 2021, Malaysia faced a substantial net forest depletion cost of over $6.35 billion, highlighting the environmental challenges associated with deforestation.

name: Peaceful Nation
title: Minimal Battle-Related Deaths
description: Malaysia recorded only 1 battle-related death in 2017, showcasing its peaceful domestic environment.

name: Modest Military Influence
title: Limited Arms Exports
description: In 2019, Malaysia's arms exports were valued at $1 million, indicating a relatively low level of military influence on the global stage.

name: Self-Reliant Economy
title: Minimal Foreign Aid Dependency
description: In 2022, Malaysia received only 0.0067% of its central government expenses from net ODA, reflecting a strong self-reliant economy.
